Abstract: The MCD15A2H version 6 MODIS Level 4, Combined Fraction of Photosynthetically Active Radiation (FPAR), and Leaf Area Index (LAI) product is an 8-day composite dataset with 500 meter pixel size.  The algorithm chooses the “best” pixel available from all the acquisitions of both MODIS sensors located on NASA’s Terra and Aqua satellites from within the 8-day period. LAI is defined as the one-sided green leaf area per unit ground area in broadleaf canopies and as one-half the total needle surface area per unit ground area in coniferous canopies.  FPAR is defined as the fraction of incident photosynthetically active radiation (400-700nm) absorbed by the green elements of a vegetation canopy.The LAI product has attained stage 2 validation and the FPAR product has attained stage 1 Validation.

RelatedUrls.Description: Data set landing page at the LP DAAC
LP DAAC Data Pool provides direct access to all currently available MODIS products and the ability to download them via HTTP.

USGS EarthExplorer (EE) provides users the ability to query, search and order archived ASTER and MODIS products available from the LP DAAC.  Registered users of EE have access to additional features than guest users.
Detailed product descriptions and additional information including links for data access, user guides, and customer support, etc.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: HORIZONTALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Horizontal tile number of a grid, which increases from left to right.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: NDAYS_COMPOSITED
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Number of days of the data that have been composited.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTGOODQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTOTHERQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with not so good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: VERTICALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Vertical tile number of a grid, which increases from top to bottom.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTGOODFPAR
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Tile-wise % of good or excellent quality FPAR pixels.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTGOODLAI
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Tile-wise % of good or excellent quality LAI pixels.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTEMPIRICALMODEL
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Tile-wise % of FPAR,LAI values calculated using Empirical (732) model method.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PROCESSVERSION
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Version of the process software that generated the product.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTMAINMETHOD
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of tile's pixels computed using the Radiative Transfer (main) method vs. the backup empirical LUT method

AdditionalAttributes.Name: TileID
AdditionalAttributes.Description: MODIS Land tile identification number which represents a geographical area on the surface of the Earth bounded by latitude and longitude coordinates.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: identifier_product_doi
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Digital object identifier that uniquely identifies this data product

AdditionalAttributes.Name: identifier_product_doi_authority
AdditionalAttributes.Description: URL of the digital object identifier resolving authority

EntryTitle: MODIS/Terra+Aqua Leaf Area Index/FPAR 8-Day L4 Global 500m SIN Grid V006

Characteristics.Name: EquatorCrossingTime
Characteristics.Description: Local time of the equator crossing and direction (ascending or descending)

Characteristics.Name: EquatorCrossingTime
Characteristics.Description: Local time of the equator crossing and direction (ascending or descending)
